country-year: Largest international resource flow to each country
The largest international resource flow to each country in each year
Development Initiatives calculations based on numerous sources (see notes for International resource flows to and from developing countries data).

This indicator is calculated by identifying the largest international resource flow to each country in each year, based on available data on official development assistance, other official flows, foreign direct investment, remittances, long- and short- term debt disbursements and portfolio equity. Observations without data on at least two of three key resources (ODA, FDI and remittances) are excluded.
